description:
Under the control of a mysterious magic, Fa, in her dragon form, strikes Kotone. The impact appears to be fatal.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Minna Arigatou! RPG Fudousan, Arata naru Tabidachi Desu!
Thanks, Everyone! RPG Real Estate`s New Journey Begins!
みんなありがとう! RPG不動産, 新たなる旅立ちです!
